item.title: 亚马逊购物机器人与 Prime 性能不相称
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔将关注亚马逊购物机器人 Rufus 的表现。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at the performance of Amazon’s shopping bot, Rufus.】

item.title: 尽管领导人忧心忡忡，但中国的汽车大战仍将持续数年
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注中国对过度竞争的担忧。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 美国贸易协议对特朗普的 "快速通道 "而言过于复杂
item.description: 曾经的解放日，这将是唐纳德-特朗普总统重新谈判美国与世界贸易关系的一周。【原文：Once upon a Liberation Day, this was going to be the week by which President Donald Trump would have renegotiated America’s trading relationships with the world.】

item.title: 在周三最后期限到来之前，特朗普设定 8 月 1 日开始征收关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划在周一宣布贸易协议并发出关税警告，各国通过周末谈判，以避免在周三截止日期前对其出口美国的产品采取最高惩罚性措施。【原文：President Donald Trump plans to announce trade deals and deliver tariff warnings on Monday, as countries negotiated through the weekend to avoid the highest punitive measures on their exports to the US before a Wednesday deadline.】

item.title: 华为人工智能实验室驳斥抄袭竞争对手机型的指责
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.）秘密的人工智能研究实验室反击了有关其依赖竞争对手的模型开发自己的盘古平台的指责，采取了不同寻常的步骤，反驳了有关其人工智能工作的说法。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s secretive AI research lab has pushed back against accusations it relied on rivals’ models to develop its own Pangu platform, taking the unusual step of rebutting claims about its artificial intelligence efforts.】

item.title: 美国关税倒计时，印度采取谨慎态度
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政府正面临国内压力，要求保护印度政治敏感的农业部门，因为印度正努力与特朗普政府达成贸易协议，躲避美国提高关税。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government is facing domestic pressure to protect India’s politically-sensitive farm sector as the nation scrambles to close a trade deal with the Trump administration and dodge higher US tariffs.】

item.title: 摩根大通称南非股市将继续反弹
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：South African stocks are poised to extend their rally in the second half, buoyed by an improving outlook for the domestic economy and supportive monetary policy, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 美国收紧贸易政策，短期国债表现出色
item.description: 本周是全球贸易的关键一周，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）加大了对其他国家的压力，要求它们在本周三的最后期限到来之前达成贸易协议。【原文：Short-dated Treasuries outperformed at the start of a key week for global trade, with US President Donald Trump intensifying pressure on other countries to strike trade deals ahead of a Wednesday deadline.】

item.title: 模型失灵让华尔街货币交易员成了瞎子
item.description: 华尔街一些屡试不爽的货币策略不再奏效，就连最老练的交易员也对此感到困惑。【原文：Some of Wall Street’s tried-and-true currency strategies aren’t working anymore, and it’s baffling even the most seasoned traders.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德退伍军人成立公司，押注医疗保健和保险业
item.description: 在布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）工作了约二十年后，Bahir Manios 和 David Levenson 创办了自己的公司，投资于基础设施、医疗保健和金融服务领域。【原文：After about two decades of working for Brookfield Asset Management, Bahir Manios and David Levenson have launched their own firm to invest in infrastructure, health care and financial services.】

item.title: 私人信贷配售代理公司 Briarcliffe 收购欧洲公司
item.description: 总部位于纽约的私人信贷配售代理公司 Briarcliffe Credit Partners 收购了总部位于伦敦的 Branch Advisory，以帮助在欧洲争取机构客户。【原文：Briarcliffe Credit Partners, a private credit placement agent headquartered in New York, has acquired London-based Branch Advisory to help court institutional clients in Europe.】

item.title: 特朗普已让下任美联储主席的工作变得更难
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普承认，他向美联储施加的降息压力，事实上正在加大央行降息的难度。【原文：President Donald Trump has acknowledged the intense pressure he’s laying on the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates is, in fact, making it harder for the central bank to do just that.】

item.title: 中国考虑将 "南向债券通 "规模扩大一倍至 1,390 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在考虑将本地投资者用于购买海外债券的投资渠道扩大一倍，这是中国努力放松资金流动限制的重要一步。【原文：China is considering doubling an investment channel local investors use to buy bonds overseas, according to people familiar with the matter, a major step in its efforts to loosen restrictions on financial flows.】

item.title: 关税最后期限临近，股票投资者心存芥蒂
item.description:

item.title: 波兰货币政策委员会主席杜达认为今年将再降息四分之一个百分点
item.description: 波兰政策制定者伊沃娜-杜达（Iwona Duda）表示，随着通胀压力的减弱，波兰今年的利率可能会再下调四分之一个百分点。【原文：Polish interest rates could be cut by a further quarter-point this year as inflation pressure subsides, according to policymaker Iwona Duda.】

item.title: 安哥拉柴油涨价后交通费涨幅高达50
item.description: 安哥拉公路运输监管机构称，上周将柴油价格提高三分之一后，公共交通票价涨幅高达50%。【原文：Angola hiked public-transport fares by as much as 50% after raising diesel prices by a third last week, the road transport regulator said.】

item.title: 狂躁的市场情绪为萌芽中的小盘股反弹敲响警钟
item.description: 美国股市过热的迹象随处可见，预示着一些风险最高的股票刚刚反弹就会遇到麻烦。【原文：Signs that US equities are overheating are cropping up everywhere, foreshadowing trouble for the nascent rebound in some of the riskiest stocks.】

item.title: NTT 准备启动双币债券销售，为并购重组再融资
item.description: 日本电信巨头 NTT 公司准备启动一次可能是巨额的债券销售，以帮助再融资过桥贷款，从而使其数据中心业务成为一个全资子公司。【原文：NTT Inc., the Japanese telecom giant, is poised to kick off what could be a jumbo bond sale to help refinance bridge loans used to make its data center business a wholly owned unit.】

item.title: 简街调查促使印度加强市场监管
item.description: 在对涉嫌操纵市场的高速交易巨头简街集团采取行动后，印度证券监管机构计划加强其监控系统，以更好地发现复杂的交易策略。【原文：India’s securities regulator plans to boost its surveillance systems to better detect complex trading strategies after taking action against high-speed trading giant Jane Street Group for alleged market manipulation.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金改革为何会波及掉期市场
item.description: 荷兰正在全面改革其养老金制度，以适应人口老龄化以及人们不再为同一个雇主工作一辈子的事实。【原文：The Netherlands is overhauling its pension system to adapt to an aging population and the fact that people no longer remain with the same employer for their entire working lives.】

item.title: 加拿大投资者集团完成交易，第一财富银行获得新生
item.description: 加拿大投资公司 Globalive Corp. 和一群支持者已经完成了对 Wealth One Bank of Canada 的收购，并计划尽快筹集更多资金以发展贷款业务。【原文：Canadian investment firm Globalive Corp. and a group of backers have closed their acquisition of Wealth One Bank of Canada, with plans to raise more capital soon to grow its lending business.】

item.title: 苹果公司就 "史无前例 "的 5 亿欧元欧盟应用商店罚款提出上诉
item.description: 苹果公司对欧盟的 5 亿欧元（约合 5.8 亿美元）罚款提出上诉，称这一处罚 "史无前例"，监管机构要求苹果公司对其 App Store 进行修改也是 "非法的"。【原文：Apple Inc. appealed a €500 million ($580 million) fine from the European Union, calling the penalty “unprecedented” and the regulator’s required changes to its App Store as “unlawful.”】

item.title: 葡萄牙认为欧盟和美国将以 "极低 "关税达成贸易协议
item.description: 葡萄牙财政部长若阿金-米兰达-萨门托（Joaquim Miranda Sarmento）表示，他认为欧盟与美国达成的关税可能低于 10%的协议将有助于保持贸易畅通。【原文：Portuguese Finance Minister Joaquim Miranda Sarmento said he sees the European Union and the US reaching an agreement with tariffs potentially below 10% that would help keep trade flowing.】

item.title: 匈牙利零售销售放缓，欧尔班的经济复苏计划受挫
item.description: 匈牙利的零售业在复活节的冲击后放缓幅度超过预期，这凸显了总理维克托-欧尔班为在大选前避免经济衰退所做努力的脆弱性。【原文：Hungarian retail sales slowed more than expected after an Easter bump, underscoring the fragility of Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s efforts to avoid a recession before elections.】

item.title: 西班牙顶级不锈钢制造商希望欧盟在贸易问题上更像特朗普
item.description: 该地区一家顶级不锈钢制造商的负责人表示，欧洲的贸易政策需要更像唐纳德-特朗普的政策，以保护濒临崩溃的钢铁行业免受中国进口产品的冲击。【原文：Europe’s approach to trade will need to be more like Donald Trump’s to protect an ailing steel industry from a flood of Chinese imports, according to the head of one of the region’s top stainless steel makers.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行押注中东，提升两位中东地区联席首席执行官
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）提升了两位高级领导人的职位，以监督其在中东地区不断增长的业务，此举表明中东地区在全球金融舞台和银行内部的影响力都在不断增长。【原文：Barclays Plc elevated a pair of senior leaders to oversee its growing business in the Middle East in a move that shows the region’s growing clout both on the global financial stage and within the bank.】

item.title: 中国人民银行持续购买黄金，储备连续第八个月增长
item.description: 由于贵金属价格接近历史最高水平，中国在 6 月份连续第八个月增加了官方黄金储备。【原文：China added to its official gold reserves for an eighth straight month in June, as prices of the precious metal traded near a record high.】

item.title: 风能骤降，化石燃料将填补欧洲电力缺口
item.description: 由于今年夏天风力发电量将下滑，电价和排放都将上升，因此欧洲的煤炭和天然气发电厂可能会伸出援手。【原文：Europe’s fleet of coal and gas plants could come to the rescue as wind power generation is set to slump this summer, driving up both electricity prices and emissions.】

item.title: 奇货可居：如何在 Pod 商店找到并保住工作（播客）
item.description: 多策略对冲基金由许多个人投资组合经理组成，近年来，由于在整个投资周期中取得了惊人的稳定回报，其管理的资产急剧增加。如果你是对冲基金经理中的一员，那么这笔钱将无比丰厚。但工作保障是无常的，很容易失去在团队中的位置。那么，如何才能真正获得并保住自己的位置呢？在本期节目中，我们采访了招聘公司 Carrington Fox 的顾问 Brian Yelvington。他也是【原文：Multi-strategy hedge funds, composed of lots of individual portfolio managers, have seen assets under management boom in recent years, thanks to astonishingly consistent returns throughout the cycle. If you’re one of the PMs, the money can be incredibly lucrative. But job security is fickle, and it’s easy to lose your place on the team. So how do you actually get your seat and keep it? On this episode, we speak with Brian Yelvington, a consultant at the recruitment firm Carrington Fox. He’s also】
